game.title: The Hero's Journey
game.objective: Save the kingdom from an evil sorcerer.
game.description: In this epic adventure, you must travel to distant lands, gather allies, and defeat the sorcerer's minions before confronting the dark lord himself.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and the title 'Savior of the Kingdom'

task.objective: Gather intelligence about the sorcerer's lair.
task.description: Speak to the wise old hermit in the forest for information.

task.objective: Retrieve the enchanted sword from the Dragon's Cave.
task.description: Battle the dragon and reclaim the sword to defeat the sorcerer.
